HOTEL_ACCOMMODATION.label: Hotel
HOTEL_ACCOMMODATION.description: A commercial accommodation that provides private rooms with meals and guest service.

child.label: Serviced Apartment
child.description: Furnished residential in an apartment building that provides private rooms with hotel-like services.

child.label: Bed and Breakfast
child.description: Small commercial accommodation or private home that offers overnight stay with breakfast.

child.label: Capsule Hotel
child.description: Small unit of capsule accommodation that offers lodging with basic overnight accommodation.

child.label: Guest House
child.description: Small commercial accommodation that usually converted from a private house.

child.label: Homestay
child.description: A budget accommodation where the guest has private room while sharing some shared areas with other guests.

child.label: Hostel
child.description: A budget accommodation that provides lodging, usually with dorm-style beds.

child.label: Hotel
child.description: A commercial accommodation that provides private rooms with meals and guest services.

child.label: Resort
child.description: A complex of accommodation that offers private rooms and recreational facilities.

child.label: Riad
child.description: A traditional Morrocan house or palace that offers accommodation.

child.label: Ryokan
child.description: A traditional Japanese inn that offers accommodation with meals.

HOUSE_ACCOMMODATION.label: House
HOUSE_ACCOMMODATION.description: A furnished house that offers accommodation and is rented out as an entire place.

child.label: Private Room
child.description: Guests will only have a private room for themselves. They will need to share common room, kitchen, or bathroom with other guests/host.

child.label: Entire House
child.description: Guests will have the whole place to themselves—they don't have to share facilities such as bathrooms, common rooms, and kitchen with other guests.

APARTMENT_ACCOMMODATION.label: Apartment
APARTMENT_ACCOMMODATION.description: Furnished residential that provides private rooms and located in an apartment building.

child.label: Private Room
child.description: Guests will only have a private room for themselves. They will need to share common room, kitchen, or bathroom with other guests/host.

child.label: Entire Apartment
child.description: Guests will have the whole place to themselves—they don't have to share facilities with other guests such as bathrooms, common rooms, and kitchen.

UNIQUE_ACCOMMODATION.label: Unique Accommodation
UNIQUE_ACCOMMODATION.description: A place of stay that is not common to be used as an accommodation, such as boat house, camp, and so on.

child.label: Campsite
child.description: A place that provides lodging and usually made from temporary structures like hut, camp or tent.

child.label: Houseboat
child.description: A commercial accommodation located on a boat or cruise ship.
